name: Education Everywhere
socialShareText: Support these nonprofits striving to improve education for children around the world with evidence-based solutions.

sponsor.description: Amplify your gift! Generous donors will match you dollar-for-dollar up to $20 each time until we reach $10,000 total matched.

nonprofits.name: Code Crew
